intro: Morelotia affinis, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. Morelotia affinis is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
